updates.u:
Invocation display bug corrected.
Trophy wall improvements made to the "My Account" page.

Clan page navigation improved.
Improvements made to the problem of writing in the forums using Internet Explorer 8.

Age of Invocations
A unique invocation for each race of dinoz.
4 new magic objects.
Timeline added at the bottom of the news page.
New Chen and Gulom missions.
Infiltration motor bug fixed This problem was due to an update of Adobe Flash Player which made it incompatible with previous versions.

Rebalancing online! (+ more)
Hypnosis only affects a dinoz for 3 cycles.
Bubble reduces attack damage in the following way: (AIR + WATER) / Total of Dinoz Elements. Bubble gives a minimum protection of 30%.
Relaxative Pill rebalanced: Speed gain reduced to +50%.
The combat engine updated from 10 to 100.
Dinoz which have defeated the Venerable will earn an icon in their status.
Bug with the magic object Ember which blocked affected dinoz from removing objects fixed.
Added time remaining for unequipping a magic object
Problem with the intelligent name entry system for clan searches corrected
Clan page design modifications. Account page design modifications. Distinction system added.
Colossus skill rebalanced Infiltration issues fixed
Infiltrations updated. If you win the fight after being discovered, you can continue the infiltration from where you were.
Dojo page access issues corrected Paradino festival navigation issues fixed
Display of dojo statistics improved
New missions prepared.
New Clan options added : Select league and modify league for the COTC
Leader selection bug fixed.
Dojo combat results hidden by default on the day of the combat. Keeps the excitement - watch without knowing the result!
New welcome page. Clearer and more complete, you can now find all the info you need on your favourite game. Take part in player surveys - they'll help us to better plan your updates.
New account options added fast movement, fewer notifications, battle summary etc. Click here
Clan page modification interface added.
Ajax acceleration implemented Page navigation interface improved.
Dinoz no longer ungroup after attacking a castle. There's no longer any need to select them all again.
The final phase battles of the IDT can now be accessed without logging in.
Your personal announcement board has been improved allowing for improved formatting.
Speed up navigation by customising your laft-hand menu bar. Click here
Your inventory is now grouped by category.
New actions for your Dinoz. Breaking up a group and changing the leader can now be done in one click!
